data.title: Sweden Wants Police Powers To Frisk People Wearing Gang Fashion
data.meta_description: Sweden's government said Thursday that it wanted to establish zones where police could search people even if they are not suspected of specific crimes, with such decisions potentially based on fashion choices associated with gangs.

Sweden Wants Police Powers To Frisk People Wearing Gang Fashion

Sweden's government said Thursday that it wanted to establish zones where police could search people even if they are not suspected of specific crimes, with such decisions potentially based on fashion choices associated with gangs.
